body_html: The problem is possibly caused by Apache or Flask not providing the necessary value of LD_LIBRARY_PATH to your Flask app. There are a couple of suggestions in this Stack Overflow answer.
body_text: The problem is possibly caused by Apache or Flask not providing the necessary value of LD_LIBRARY_PATH to your Flask app. There are a couple of suggestions in this Stack Overflow answer.
body: The problem is possibly caused by Apache or Flask not providing the necessary value of `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` to your Flask app. There are a couple of suggestions in [this Stack Overflow answer](http://stackoverflow.com/a/37731516/3574081).
